Question & Options:

Options:
A. Estranged brothers who meet after 12 years
B. Attempt to blackmail and assault in front of lawyers fails

Correct Answer: a) Estranged brothers who meet after 12 years, b) Attempt to blackmail and assault in front of lawyers fails
